comment: A man stands on wooden supports and surveys damage .
A large earth moving machine creating a track with a man watching it closely with what looks like surveying equipment .
Two small dark-skinned children surveying a dump with green trees in the background .
A scuba diver surveying the tranquil underwater environment .
A boy surveys merchandise in an alleyway market .
Two Chicago police officers are surveying a demolition area .
A blond woman in white tennis clothes surveys the crowd at a tennis match .
A group of men happily survey the day 's catch of fish .
A player surveys the court to inbound during a high school basketball game .
Men with surveying equipment are in the background of landscape .
Four men , 3 in white lab coats and one wearing black jacket , surveying bread buns in industrial kitchen .
A man in a suit surveys a park in the daytime with a caged tree in the foreground and town homes in the background .
A member of a Japanese survey crew kneels at the side of the road while holding a wooden 2x4 .
A round , white-bearded man with glasses surveys a paper from a meeting table which bears other papers and glasses and pitchers of water .
A mounted policeman on a dappled horse surveys a crowd .
Two men in the construction industry are surveying their work space .
A man surveys fields near the edge of town .
A couple of people survey the sea for wildlife .
Two people survey the night sky , illuminated by the moon and the glow of the city they are in , with an ornate bust occupying the space to their right .
Two Asian women wearing traditional head garb survey a garden .
A police officer and firemen are surveying a car wreck where a van has gone off-road .
A man surveying in a fairly large city .
A man in combat fatigues surveys the scene using binoculars .
